panels.description:
Per-template active contracts count

* as observed since last restart

targets.expr: label_replace(sum without(type) (pipeline_events_total{job="$jvm", type="create"}) - ((sum without(type) (pipeline_events_total{job="$jvm", type="archive"})) or (sum without(type) (pipeline_events_total{job="$jvm", type="create"}) * 0)), "short_template", "$1", "template", ".*?:(.*)")

targets.expr: jvm_cpu_recent_utilization_ratio{namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", container=~"$container", job="$jvm"} * jvm_cpu_count{namespace="$namespace", pod=~"$pod", container=~"$container", job="$jvm"}
